argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | omndadd.0 | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | omndadd.1 | |- .<_ = ( le ` M ) |
| 3 |  | omndadd.2 | |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppG ` M ) = ( oppG ` M ) |
| 5 | 4, 1 | #P_oppgbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( oppG ` M ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 2 | #P_oppgle | |- .<_ = ( le ` ( oppG ` M ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( oppG ` M ) ) = ( +g ` ( oppG ` M ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_omndadd | |- ( ( ( oppG ` M ) e. oMnd /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ X .<_ Y ) -> ( X ( +g ` ( oppG ` M ) ) Z ) .<_ ( Y ( +g ` ( oppG ` M ) ) Z ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 4, 7 | #P_oppgplus | |- ( X ( +g ` ( oppG ` M ) ) Z ) = ( Z .+ X ) |
| 10 | 3, 4, 7 | #P_oppgplus | |- ( Y ( +g ` ( oppG ` M ) ) Z ) = ( Z .+ Y ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_3brtr3g | |- ( ( ( oppG ` M ) e. oMnd /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ X .<_ Y ) -> ( Z .+ X ) .<_ ( Z .+ Y ) ) |
